oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sergeant Alvin C. York, Tom Watson Rich, and John Shelby Crabtree

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Railroads; Soldiers; Arrivals & departures; Rural areas; Country life
York, Alvin Cullum, 1887-1964; Rich, Tom Watson; Crabtree, John Shelby, 1919- 2001; Railroads -- Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sergeant Alvin C. York is shown bidding goodbye to Tom Watson Rich and John Shelby Crabtree as they leave for U. S. Army duty on the Oneida & Western Railway. They are shown in front of the train with the engineer and another passenger.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee Department of Conservation Photograph Collection, 1937-1976
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Alvin Cullum York, a Congressional Medal of Honor winner for his heroism in World War I, was born in Pall Mall, Tennessee.
